TestCase.Title: Test case EID_CLIENT_A1_04
TestCase.Purpose: This test case checks the behavior of the eID-Client in case the TC Token URL is a http-URL.

TestStep.Description: [ENC_TC_TOKEN_URL_HTTP] is a properly encoded http-URL where the TC Token can be retrieved by the eID-Client.
Note that the [ENC_TC_TOKEN_URL_HTTP] contains a HTTP URL instead of HTTPS.

ExpectedResult.Text: The eID-Client does not connect to the given URL.
The eID-Client reports a communication error. It returns an error "Bad Request" to the browser. In case of a web server based Client-Interface, the HTTP error code is "400 Bad Request".
